abilities.title: Unity Wins War
abilities.text: At the start of this Unit's activation, choose another allied Galactic Republic character or another allied Mercenary character. The chosen character may . Then, one character in this Unit may . Force Repulse Choose a character in this Unit. Push each other character within 2 of the chosen character 2 Away from it. Feinting Blow When a character in this Unit makes a attack as part of a combat action, during the Modify Dice step, this Unit may use this ability.
